ARABIC: وَمَا وَجَدْنَا لِأَكْثَرِهِم مِّنْ عَهْدٍ وَإِن وَجَدْنَآ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَفَٰسِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We did not find many of them worthy of their contract. We found most of them deviators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We did not find many of them faithful to their promises, and found many of them disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We did not find most of them true to their covenants; indeed We found most of them to he transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We did not find many among them keeping their promises. However, We did find many evil-doers among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We found most of them not true to their words; and indeed We found most of them disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And most of them We found not true to their covenant, but most of them We found indeed rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We did not find in most of them any (faithfulness to) covenant, and We found most of them to be certainly transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We found no covenant in the most part of them; indeed, We found the most part of them ungodly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We found no (loyalty to any) covenant in most of them. Nay, most of them We found wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We found most of them untrue to their covenants, indeed We found most of them to be defiant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We found no covenant in most of them; and most of them We found ungodly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not find in most of them any [loyalty to] covenants. Indeed, We found most of them to be transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Most of them We found not men (true) to their covenant: but most of them We found rebellious and disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And most of them We found not (true) to their covenant, but most of them We found indeed Fasiqun (rebellious, disobedient to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We did not find the covenant upheld by the majority of them, but We found most of them evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We found most of them untrue to their covenants; We found most of them corrupt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did not find for most of them any covenant; but indeed, We found most of them defiantly disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:102] And We did not find in most of them, that is, people, any covenant, that is, any loyalty to a covenant from the day the pledge was made. Nay (wa-in: in is softened) We found that most of them were indeed wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We found no (loyalty to any) covenant) the first covenant (in most of them. Nay, most of them) all of them (We found wrong-doers) breakers of covenants.
